Name Rascal/Libraries/Scripting/shell

Function
  1. list[str] shell(str commands)
  2. list[str] shell(str commands, int duration)
  3. list[str] shell(list[str] commands)
  4. list[str] shell(list[str] commands, int duration)
Description Given a single string containing command, or a list of strings containing successive lines with commands, the commands are fed into the RascalShell and the output is returned as a list of strings. An optional duration argument may be present to limit the time (in milliseconds) the execution may take. By default, the duration is set to 1000 ms.
